title: Pep Guardiola
summary: Josep "Pep" Guardiola Sala (Catalan pronunciation: [ʒuˈzɛb ɡwəɾðiˈɔlə]; born 18 January 1971) is a Spanish professional football manager and former player, who is the current manager of Premier League club Manchester City. He is often considered to be one of the greatest managers of all time[3][4] and holds the records for the most consecutive league games won in La Liga, the Bundesliga and the Premier League.[note 1]
